All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Attack
    Attack action of the player.
    CardColor
    All card colors
    Cards
    The type Cards.
    CardStack
    Creates a card stack between the values: int 11 - 63
    Client
    Class to handle each connected client
    ClientManager
    The Client manager.
    ClientNetwork
    Controls the network settings of the client
    ControllerInterface
    Interface for an fxml controller.
    CreditsController
    This Controller is managing the initial load of this pane and a button-click-event called goBack()
    CSSController
    The type Css controller.
    Defend
    Defend action of the player.
    fxmlNavigator
    This class is The giver of all navigation that will be used to change the overlay/gui dynamically
    GameBoardController
    Controls the GameBoard and with that the heart components of the clients part in the game
    gameClient
    This is the main method to control the game client
    GameManager
    This contains every function to execute the game and manage it.
    GameServerMain
    The main class for the server.
    HomeScreenController
    Loads all fxml elements for the home screen, e.g.
    LoadingScreenController
    Loading screen with progress bar that shows the status of caching all card images.
    LoginController
    Controls the login screen and login of the client to the server.
    Main  
    MainController
    The Master Pane Controller, this Class is always active as the childs of the master Pane are switched but not the master pane itself
    PaneResizer
    Resizes each pane in the active scene
    ParsedServerMessage
    Evaluates the message from the server.
    Player
    This represents one of the 8 possible players.
    ServerConsoleInput
    Controls the server console input.
    ServerNetwork
    Creates a server for the card game.
    SettingsController
    This class holds various options like a FullScreen option, a Sound-slider which is not implemented and a theme changer
    SpecialTexture
    Enum for the card design
    StartupScreenController
    The startup screen of the card game showing 4 different cards.
